segments.text: Well , that's all for the interview . Thank you for your interest in this job .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You are welcome . Thank you for taking time out of your busy schedule to interview me .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: May I call you about our final decision ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , please . My telephone number is 2974-5328 , and you can call me at any time in the daytime .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We will get in touch with you by the end of next week .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Great . I will look forward to hearing from you . And do I need the second interview ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We'll notify you if necessary . Goodbye .
segments.speaker: S1
